node.title: Lauren Boebert Apologizes to Muslims for Ilhan Omar Comment, Calls It a 'Distraction'
node.description: "There are plenty of policy differences to focus on without this unnecessary distraction," the congresswoman tweeted on Friday.

node.title: Pat Cummins isn't perfect and he's happy that way
node.description: Australia's new men's Test captain is not afraid to admit he has flaws, a characteristic that may help him thrive in the role, writes David Mark.

node.title: When No. 1 Is a Lot Better Than No. 2
node.description: Gonzaga crushed U.C.L.A. in a marquee early season matchup, backing up its victory over the Bruins in last year’s Final Four.

node.title: Ralf Rangnick Will Manage Manchester United. For Now.

node.title: Expert says chronic fatigue syndrome sufferers should be exempt from Covid-19 vaccination
node.description: One of the country's leading biomedical scientists has written to the prime minister and director-general of health urging vaccination exemptions for chronic fatigue syndrome sufferers.

node.title: Western monarch butterflies are returning to California
node.description: Roughly 50,000 have been counted so far – up from 2,000 last year. But one report says there is a 72% chance they will be quasi-extinct in 20 years.

node.title: New variant: UK adds African countries to 'red' quarantine list
node.description: Travellers arriving in England and Scotland from several southern African countries will have to quarantine amid warnings over a new coronavirus variant.

node.description: Los Angeles city employees were given until mid-December to provide proof of vaccination against COVID-19.

node.title: House of Gucci is inspired by a true story of scandal, betrayal, ambition and ... murder
node.description: House of Gucci weaves the tale of how Patrizia Reggiani managed to muscle her way into one of fashion's most powerful families and threaten its legacy, setting off a "reckless spiral of betrayal, decadence and revenge". The true story behind it is almost unbelievable. Warning: spoilers for House of Gucci ahead.

node.title: What powers and immunity will Australian forces have while they are deployed in Solomon Islands?

node.title: COVID gave us as the chance for a 'life-changing' economic experiment, but we've turned our backs on it
